body_html:
Every time restart ubuntu and type nvcc will not recognize, need type this 2 lines below then nvcc can work. Any suggestion, really appreciate.
1)export PATH=/usr/local/cuda-9.2/bin${PATH:+:${PATH}}
2)export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda-9.2/lib64
${LD_LIBRARY_PATH:+:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}}
